filter-mode.name: Filter Mode
filter-mode.hint: Hide - hides not applicable feats from the list, mark - marks the incompatible feat with a pattern

defaults-to-character.name: Default to player's character
defaults-to-character.hint: When deselecting all tokens, filter feats based on the player's assigned character

must-have-sheet-open.name: Must have open character sheet
must-have-sheet-open.hint: Filters feats only if the actor's character sheet is open

highlight-on-feat-sheet.name: Highlight prerequisites
highlight-on-feat-sheet.hint: Colorize prerequisites satisfied by the currently selected character

use-extended-predicates.name: Use extended predicates
use-extended-predicates.hint: Includes best lore, spells, spellcasting, focus points, languages, senses, class-hp

ignore-specific-lores.name: Ignore specific Lores
ignore-specific-lores.hint: Predicates that require specific lore ranks are always satisfied

lore._forTranslators:
Dear translators!
This text is just for you. The following fields contain all the existing lores that the module has predicates for. In order to support localization, you need to replace them with regular expressions that would match the lore name in your language. These will be converted with `SearchFilter.cleanQuery` function. These are not slugs. You don't have to add '-lore' to the end. If you are unsure of how to write a regular expression, part of the lore name that is common between all the name variants will work, or just list all the name variants you can think of separated by '|' (vertical bar/pipe operator).
With kind regards,
A fellow translator
